titleInfo.title: 'PROPOSED RESERVATION FOR REFINERY, WATER WELLS & LINES TO SITRA.'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: blueprint on tracing paperDimensions: 305 x 560mm, on sheet 330 x 590mm

mods.abstract: Blueprint sketch map produced by the Bahrain Petroleum Company, depicting the proposed reservation of land for the refinery at Sitra [Sitrah], Bahrain. Enclosed with a letter no. PA-751 (folio 5).Shows the existing Refinery Reservation covering 563 acres, pipeline and road rights-of-way, and reservation for water wells, and also the land the company wished to further reserve, described in six parcels (folios 6-11), with co-ordinates and measurements.Supersedes SK-120 dated 3 January 1936.
